title: ‘SNL’ recap: Best moments from Ariana Grande hosting ‘Saturday Night Live’

title: 1 dead, 1 injured in fatal Stoughton crash
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Crime The fatal crash occurred after a police pursuit of a pickup truck driver that began in Brockton and carried into Stoughton.
By Darin Zullo December 21, 2025 | 8:58 AM 1 minute to read One person was killed and another was hospitalized after a crash in Stoughton that occurred during a police pursuit Saturday.

title: On IG, Padma Lakshmi gives a rave review to Boston Indian-fusion restaurant
author: Morgan Rousseau
bullets: Food Lakshmi was in town for an MFA appearance when locals tipped her off to the restaurant.
Padma Lakshmi.
(Inez and Vinoodh) Award-winning food host Padma Lakshmi was in Boston last week and gave a ringing endorsement after stopping by a local Indian-fusion restaurant.

title: Did Bruins make wrong call starting Jeremy Swayman for 4th-straight game?
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Boston Bruins “It was a big game for us, and we thought he would give us the best chance.
" Jeremy Swayman started his fourth-straight game on Saturday.

(AP Photo/Jim Davis) A few days after harping on some of the silver linings drawn out of a regulation loss to the Oilers, Marco Sturm wasn’t following the same script after Boston secured at least a point in the standings against the Canucks.

title: Payton Pritchard leads shorthanded Celtics to gutty win over Raptors: 7 takeaways

title: Marco Sturm explains his unorthodox choice for Bruins’ shootout order in loss
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Boston Bruins "I thought he was going to do it again, and he didn’t.

title: Payton Pritchard drops 33 points as spark plug in Celtics win over Raptors
author: Colin McCarthy
bullets: Boston Celtics Pritchard stepped up as Jaylen Brown missed the second half of Boston's back to back.
Payton Pritchard scored 33 points on Saturday night.

(Frank Gunn/The Canadian Press via AP) With no Jaylen Brown and on the second half of a back to back against a Raptors team that entered the night with the third best record in the Eastern Conference, the Celtics still found a way to win on Saturday night.

title: 5 things to know about rumored Red Sox target and Japanese pitcher Tatsuya Imai
